home.subtitle: with Habemus: the online platform for developing and hosting websites.

sectionCode.h2: Your code, your style, exactly the way you want
sectionCode.h1: Craft experiences that are perfect to the last pixel. Really
sectionCode.p: Habemus Webeditor is a cloud-based code editor carefully designed for the modern web development workflow. It is a perfect fit for anything that can be built with html, css and javascript: inspiring landing pages, web UIs, games, interactive data visualizations, etc.
sectionCode.setupReadyText: you don't need to setup a new workspace for every new project
sectionCode.potentialCss3Text: our webeditor takes care of browser css prefixes and compatibility
sectionCode.codeSafeText: your project is safely stored in the cloud
sectionCode.controlHistory: Control the history of your project
sectionCode.controlHistoryText: all published versions are kept so that you can restore them at anytime.

sectionTest.p: From the very beginning, your website has a public shareable preview url for you to access from any browser in any internet connected device
sectionTest.previewRealTimeText: Edit code and see the results in real time
sectionTest.efficientTests: Debug your code in real-world scenarios
sectionTest.efficientTestsText: No more waiting until deploy to discover that {{ naughty / annoying }} bug
sectionTest.shareableUrlText: Collaborate with other people by letting them access your website from any browser while it is in development
sectionTest.codeInterfaceConnectedText: Inspect the preview to find the corresponding source code

sectionPublish.p: Easily host your website at Habemus' high-availability production servers directly from the webeditor.
sectionPublish.hassleFreeText: Publish a new version of your project directly from the webeditor
sectionPublish.autoDeployText: our CI (continuous integration) deployment pipeline takes care of minifying and optimizing your website with lossless quality
sectionPublish.domainText: Connect as many custom domains as you want to your website
sectionPublish.workSafeText: Your website is safe with us

sectionTemplates.h2: using one of our starter projects
sectionTemplates.p: We‚Äôve crafted some nice starter projects with the basic structure set up. They are great for starting your own website. Check them out!

sectionWeb.powerOfWebText: We believe in the power and in the openness of web standards. Modern HTML, CSS and are technologies that enable developers to create deeply immersive and beautiful digital experiences.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.p2: Founded in S√£o Paulo in the end of 2015, habemus is a technology startup that creates tools and provides services that simplify software development and stimulate tech knowledge sharing around the world.
aboutUs.p3: Our team is composed by idealistic people who believe in changing reality by empowering more people to create technology.
aboutUs.lucianaText: Graduated in design, she started learning programming in order to achieve more autonomy in building her ideas. She believes in the potential for positive social impact of technology. Cofounder and teacher of web programming at PrograMaria as well.
aboutUs.simonText: Started Economics at Universidade de S√£o Paulo, but quit school to dive deeply into web development. Has had some experience with start-ups. Nowadays Simon is completely focused on the task of empowering people through the dissemination of tech-knowledge.
aboutUs.joinTeamText: We're looking for people who also love building the web and that can bring even more love to our team!
aboutUs.sendMsg: Send us a message and let's have a coffee
aboutUs.name: Your name

Tell us a little bit about you!
